author: minfrin
msg: Create the pidfile world readable by adding APR_FPROT_WREAD. Use
non-deprecated versions of the APR constants.

msg: TS-142: remove unused cruft for supporting linux 2.0 !! and Digital Unix circa 2000.

msg: Removed the last references to SearchControls in shared-ldap

author: minfrin
msg: Try open the pid file twice, once before daemonisation so we can see any
error, and once after daemonisation so the child's pid is logged correctly.

msg: Allowed the use of multi-line documentation.
